channel.title: RISE Physical Therapy
channel.description: Welcome to RISE Physical Therapy. Providing physical therapy in Solana Beach, Carlsbad, & Point Loma. Visit us today to schedule your appointment!

item.title: The Role of Physical Therapy in Pre and Post-Op Care
item.description: Recovering from a major surgery can be physically and emotionally difficult. Pre and post-op physical therapy can often speed up the recovery process for many patients.

item.title: The Importance of Hip and Thoracic Spine Mobility in Prevention of Lower Back Pain in The Golf Swing
item.description: Lower back pain is a common among golfers of all levels. We highlight the importance of hip & spine mobility in relieving this pain, and stretches to prevent future injuries.

item.title: An Essential Part of the Core: The Pelvic Floor
item.description: The pelvic floor is one of the most underrated muscle groups of the human body. Learn about what it is, what it does, and how to maintain a strong pelvic floor.

item.title: Overhead Athletes and Shoulder Health
item.description: Overhead athletes face specific challenges when it comes to maintaining shoulder health and preventing injury. RISE Physical Therapy discuss them here.

item.title: Static vs. Dynamic Stretching
item.description: Many of us only know of one way to stretch: static stretching. But dynamic stretching can have major benefits for athletic performance & injury prevention.

item.title: 3 Things You Didn't Know Your Physical Therapist Could Do
item.description: There are applications for physical therapy outside of treating back pain, sports injuries, or surgical rehab. Here are 3 things physical therapists can also do.

item.title: Dancing with Pain
item.description: RISE Physical Therapy's Justin Ternes explains the importance of leaning how to dance with, rather than fight, your pain.

item.title: Hips Don't Lie - How to Unlock Tight Hips
item.description: Whether you to sit all day at work or you've just killed leg day at the gym, you've likely experienced issues with tight hips. Here are 5 ways to unlock those tight hips!

item.title: Why Physical Therapy Should Be Your First Line of Defense
item.description: When it comes to pain, physical therapy should be your first line of defense. Learn how physical therapy can be the step 1 in injury treatment & prevention.

item.title: North County Love
item.description: RISE is a proud member of the North County business community. We provide physical therapy in Solana Beach, Carlsbad, and Point Loma.

item.title: Running Injury Prevention Clinic at Movin Shoes
item.description: RISE Physical Therapy is proud to partner with Movin Shoes in Encinitas and offer running injury prevention clinics to the North County running community.

item.title: How Elite Athletes Can Use Physical Therapy As Part of Their Training Program
item.description: By incorporating physical therapy into a standard training program, elite athletes can reap additional benefits through sports therapy & rehabilitation.

item.title: What is a Biomechanical Assessment and Why You Should Get One
item.description: Most physical therapy treatment plans begin and end with a biomechanical assessment to track patient progress and help patients achieve maximum mobility.

item.title: The Do's and Don'ts of Injury Rehabilitation
item.description: Getting injured is no fun. Sometimes, though, the rehabilitation exercises required to get you back to 100% are even more difficult. Here are some do's and don'ts when it comes to injury rehabilitation.

item.title: The 6 Most Common Sports Injuries (and How You Can Avoid Them)
item.description: If you're physically active or involved in sports, you'll want to know about the most common sports injuries, and how you can avoid them.

item.title: Ball.Is.Life
item.description: Dr. Navid Hannanvash grew up on a basketball court and attributes the lessons he learned to many of the founding principles of RISE Physical Therapy.

item.title: Welcome Dr. Alex Kelso to the RISE Physical Therapy Family
item.description: Please join us in welcoming Dr. Alex Kelso to the RISE Physical Therapy family!

item.title: Foundations - The Thoracic Spine
item.description: The thoracic spine is often the cause of many of these injuries because of a lack of motion in its segments. Here are some thoracic spine Do's & Don'ts.

item.title: Foundations - The Pelvis
item.description: The pelvis acts as a foundational for the spine and provides stability. Learn more about physical therapy for the pelvis and dry-land training.

item.title: Foundations - New RISE Partnerships
item.description: RISE Physical Therapy is proud to announce our partnership with the Solana Beach Boys and Girls Club and the Rancho San Dieguito Swim Club!

item.title: RISE and RISE Again
item.description: At RISE Physical Therapy we strive to uphold all the core values of our company that are contained with our name - Revolution In Self Evolution.
